properties.name: app.jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret key used for JWT token signing

properties.name: app.jwt.expiration
properties.description: JWT token expiration time in milliseconds

properties.name: app.security.mfa.issuer
properties.description: Issuer name for MFA (Multi-Factor Authentication) setup

properties.name: app.security.account.max-failed-attempts
properties.description: Maximum number of failed login attempts before account is locked

properties.name: app.security.account.lock-time-minutes
properties.description: Duration in minutes for which an account remains locked after exceeding max failed attempts

properties.name: app.url
properties.description: Base URL of the application, used for generating links

properties.name: management.endpoints.web.exposure.include
properties.description: List of actuator endpoints to expose

properties.name: management.endpoint.health.show-details
properties.description: When to show full health details (never, always, when-authorized)

properties.name: management.endpoint.health.status.order
properties.description: Comma-separated list of health statuses in order of severity

properties.name: spring.cloud.config.fail-fast
properties.description: Whether to fail startup if the config server cannot be reached

properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret key used for JWT token signing (deprecated, use app.jwt.secret instead)

properties.name: jwt.expiration
properties.description: JWT token expiration time in milliseconds (deprecated, use app.jwt.expiration instead)
